item.question: What is this app about?
item.answer: This app is designed to connect people who want to contribute to reducing poverty with those in need. Users can donate to non-governmental organizations (NGOs), sign up as beneficiaries for support, and participate in volunteering opportunities.

item.question: How does this app align with SDG 1 (No Poverty)?
item.answer: The app promotes SDG 1 by fostering donations, providing support for underprivileged communities, and encouraging volunteerism to help reduce poverty and improve livelihoods.

item.question: Who can use this app?
item.answer: Anyone can sign up, whether you want to donate, volunteer, or seek assistance as a beneficiary.

item.question: How do I create an account?
item.answer: Tap the "Sign Up" button on the home screen, provide the required details, and follow the steps to verify your account.

item.question: Can I customize my profile?
item.answer: Yes, after logging in, you can edit your profile details, upload a profile picture, and set preferences in the settings menu.

item.question: What if I forget my password?
item.answer: Click "Forgot Password" on the login screen and follow the instructions to reset your password.

item.question: Are my donations secure?
item.answer: Yes, we use secure payment gateways to ensure your transactions are safe.

item.question: How do I sign up as a beneficiary?
item.answer: Choose the "Sign Up as Beneficiary" option during registration or from your account settings if you already have an account.

item.question: What kind of support can I expect as a beneficiary?
item.answer: Beneficiaries can receive donations, participate in community programs, and get assistance through volunteer activities.

item.question: How will I be notified about support?
item.answer: Notifications will be sent via the app, and you can view updates on your dashboard.

item.question: How can I participate in volunteer activities?
item.answer: Go to the "Volunteer" page to browse available opportunities. Sign up for events that align with your interests and availability.

item.question: Can organizations post volunteer opportunities?
item.answer: Yes, NGOs and community groups can submit volunteer opportunities for approval to be listed on the app.

item.question: What should I do if I experience a technical issue?
item.answer: Use the "Contact Support" feature in the settings menu or email our support team at [support_email@example.com].

item.question: Is there an offline mode?
item.answer: Some features, such as browsing information, may be available offline. However, actions like donations or account updates require an internet connection.

item.question: Is my personal information safe?
item.answer: Yes, we prioritize user privacy and comply with data protection regulations. Please read our Privacy Policy for more details.

item.question: Can I delete my account?
item.answer: Yes, go to the settings menu and select "Delete Account." Note that this action is irreversible.
